Posts.Content: Jan 20, 2010 07:43PM Celestec wrote: Thanks Linda. I have to have myself checked out. Stay well!
Posts.Title: odor and breast cancer Celestec CrunchyPoodleMama

Posts.Content: Celestec wrote: Best, Best wishes to everyone out there.  I have a question regarding breast odor.  My sister was just diagnosed with breast cancer and  she mentioned that several months ago, while at the gym, she had noticed a horrible smell coming from her breast (in her bra).  She had initially thought it was coming from the person next to her actually. I was shocked because I myself have noticed the same smell in my sweaty bra at the gym, (we go to different gyms - it's not the gym).  I had noticed the smell months ago and it is always there when I sweat.  It is not a sweat smell.  It is a horrible smell, like a dead rat unfortunately.  I know many people, and dogs, can detect cancer odors. I will get myself checked out but I was wondering whether anyone has had a similar experience? Did you notice an offensive odor on your clothing, in your bra, your body, or anywhere else for that matter  that was not sweat or due to something you ate?  Thanks so much everyone.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: odor and breast cancer Celestec CrunchyPoodleMama
